hot_drinks.name: Espresso
hot_drinks.description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.

hot_drinks.name: Cappuccino
hot_drinks.description: A coffee-based drink prepared with espresso, hot milk, and steamed milk foam.

hot_drinks.name: Latte
hot_drinks.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

hot_drinks.name: Macchiato
hot_drinks.description: An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed.

hot_drinks.name: Mocha
hot_drinks.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a caffè latte.

hot_drinks.name: Americano
hot_drinks.description: A coffee drink prepared by diluting espresso with hot water.

hot_drinks.name: Flat White
hot_drinks.description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles and a glossy or velvety consistency).

hot_drinks.name: Irish Coffee
hot_drinks.description: A cocktail consisting of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and sugar, stirred, and topped with cream.

hot_drinks.name: Turkish Coffee
hot_drinks.description: A traditional method of preparing coffee where very finely ground coffee is simmered in a pot.

hot_drinks.name: Affogato
hot_drinks.description: A coffee-based dessert consisting of a scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream topped or 'drowned' with a shot of hot espresso.

hot_drinks.name: Vienna Coffee
hot_drinks.description: A cream-based coffee beverage similar to a cappuccino but made with whipped cream instead of milk foam.

hot_drinks.name: Café au Lait
hot_drinks.description: Coffee with hot milk added, typically using a 1:1 ratio.

hot_drinks.name: Red Eye
hot_drinks.description: A cup of coffee with a shot of espresso added.

hot_drinks.name: Café Bombón
hot_drinks.description: An espresso served with sweetened condensed milk.

hot_drinks.name: Café con Leche
hot_drinks.description: A Spanish coffee beverage consisting of strong coffee with scalded milk.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Coffee
iced_drinks.description: Chilled coffee brewed with hot water and served over ice cubes.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Tea
iced_drinks.description: A chilled tea beverage served over ice.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Latte
iced_drinks.description: Espresso with chilled milk served over ice.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Cappuccino
iced_drinks.description: Similar to a regular cappuccino but served cold over ice.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Mocha
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of mocha, made with espresso, milk, and chocolate syrup.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Macchiato
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of macchiato, made with espresso and a splash of milk over ice.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Americano
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of an Americano, prepared by diluting espresso with cold water.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Flat White
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of flat white, made with espresso and cold milk.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Irish Coffee
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of Irish coffee, made with cold coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and cream.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Turkish Coffee
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of Turkish coffee, made with cold brewed coffee and traditional spices.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Affogato
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of affogato, made with vanilla gelato or ice cream and cold espresso.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Vienna Coffee
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of Vienna coffee, made with espresso and whipped cream over ice.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Café au Lait
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of café au lait, made with coffee and cold milk.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Red Eye
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of red eye, made with coffee and cold espresso.

iced_drinks.name: Iced Café Bombón
iced_drinks.description: Chilled version of café bombón, made with espresso and sweetened condensed milk over ice.
